players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote her out to protect the town."
You: "Diana, that's a bold accusation with no evidence. Why are you trying to mislead the town on day one?"
Charlie: "I think we need more than accusations without evidence. Diana, why are you so sure about Alice?"
Diana: "Alice, I was investigated at night and found to be the mafioso. I am the detective, and I have no reason to lie. Please vote to arrest Alice to keep the town safe."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why would you investigate me first night? That makes no sense. I think you're lying to frame me."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you wait until after my question to claim your role? That seems suspicious timing."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
